etymology.description: Depicts a tilling tool or plow
etymology.interpretation: The character 耒(耒) (lěi, "tilling tool") visually represents the shape of an ancient agricultural implement, resembling a hand plow or hoe used for tilling the soil in traditional farming.

examples.chinese: 老农挥舞着耒在田间劳作(老農揮舞著耒在田間勞作)。
examples.pinyin: Lǎo nóng huī wǔ zhe lěi zài tián jiān láo zuò.
examples.english: The old farmer swings the tilling tool while working in the field.

examples.chinese: 春雨过后(春雨過後)，农夫拿起耒开始耕种(農夫拿起耒開始耕種)。
examples.pinyin: Chūn yǔ guò hòu, nóng fū ná qǐ lěi kāi shǐ gēng zhòng.
examples.english: After the spring rain, the farmer picks up the tilling tool and begins to cultivate the land.

examples.chinese: 先民用耒开垦荒野(先民用耒開墾荒野)。
examples.pinyin: Xiān mín yòng lěi kāi kěn huāng yě.
examples.english: The pioneers used the tilling tool to reclaim the wilderness.
